articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo had a long-running partnership with Portuguese super agent Jorge Mendes ahead of his transfer to Saudi Arabian outfit Al-Nassr with further details on their falling out now emerging
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo's explosive Piers Morgan interview served as an emphatic goodbye to super-agent Jorge Mendes ahead of his stunning exit from Manchester United.
 The pair had enjoyed a profitable r… [+2309 chars]
